title: Two college students paired Meta’s Ray Ban smart glasses with facial recognition...
content:
Two college students paired Metaâ€™s Ray Ban smart glasses with facial recognition tech and were able to pull up info on strangers (name, home address, phone number, and family members) in seconds just by looking at them.
